trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides automatic conversion between a nullable type and its underlying primitive type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The specified nullable type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: type is not a nullable type.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxx$$xx$ xx xxx x xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the nullable type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the underlying type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the underlying type converter.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether this converter can convert an object of the given type to the type of this converter, using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether this converter can convert the object to the specified type, using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if this converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the given object to the type of this converter, using the specified context and culture information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the given value object to the specified type, using the specified context and culture information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: destinationType is null.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The conversion cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a collection of properties for the type of array specified by the value parameter, using the specified context and attributes.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether this object supports properties, using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns a collection of standard values for the data type this type converter is designed for when provided with a format context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxx$ xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns whether the given value object is valid for this type and for the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the specified value is valid for this object; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x
